title: Customer Service Associate - WFH
tagsAndSkills: Inbound Voice Process,Customer Service,International BPO,International Voice Process

ambitionBoxData.Title: DATAMARK BPO SERVICE (P) LTD Reviews by Employees

jobDescription:
Greetings from DATAMARK,MUMBAI !


We're urgently hiring for Customer Service Associates (PERMANENT WFH) !


Position Overview:

The Customer Service Representative (CSR) provides information and solutions in response to inquiries pertaining to products, services and/or customer complaints. Duties may include, but are not limited to, accessing databases to retrieve and/or record information such as customer complaints or orders; responding to customer complaints or inquiries; keeping records of customer interactions; and updating customer account information.


Primary Responsibilities:


Answer incoming calls or places outbound calls in a timely and professional manner, responds to routine questions and takes complaints; inputs and/or logs information received into the call centers communications and computer system

  • Properly log each call and ensure that the caller receives the correct information
  • Maintain professionalism at all times even during stressful phone interactions
  • Interact with customers and personnel to provide basic or scripted information in response to routine inquiries about products and services. May handle and resolve customer complaints and escalations.
  • Assists with other Call Center duties, such as emergency operations, special projects, and training responsibilities or other similar tasks
  • Must maintain specific knowledge of related computer software required to perform any role, function or task required for day-today operations relating to issuance of work orders and and/or information requests
  • Must use and teach prescribed telephone etiquette and customer service procedures; must be courteous to customers and employees; provides advice, guidance to personnel.
  • May be required to work overtime, weekends, holidays, and/or during declared emergencies
  • Maintain excellent diction, grammar, voice quality, and articulation
  • Combines knowledge of product, good work ethic, effective time management skills, and human relations skills to meet performance standards and positively influence the call centers image
  • Demonstrates a commitment to learning quickly and effectively applying knowledge
  • Demonstrates a commitment to supporting a productive, positive work environment.

**Candidates should have excellent communication skills.(English Language)

**ONLY MUMBAI/NAVI MUMBAI/THANE CANDIDATES CAN APPLY.

**HSC PASS CANDIDATES CAN ALSO APPLY.

**NO TARGETS.

**CANDIDATES SHOULD BE FLEXIBLE WITH 24/7 SHIFTS.



Interested candidates can send in their resume at Lalitha.nadar@datamark.net

title: Android Lead / Architect (Bangalore / Pune / Mangalore)
tagsAndSkills: MVVM,Android,Kotlin,Architecture
jobDescription:
Infosys is a global leader in technology services and consulting. We enable clients in more than 50 countries to create and execute strategies for their digital transformation. From engineering to application development, knowledge management and business process management, we help our clients find the right problems to solve, and to solve these effectively. Our team of 190,000+ innovators, across the globe, is differentiated by the imagination, knowledge and experience, across industries and technologies that we bring to every project we undertake.

In the role of Technology Lead, you will be expected to develop and support -

  • Primary
  • Android- Java, Kotlin, Kotlin Multiplatform

In the role, you will interface with key stakeholders and apply application development & deployment proficiency across different stages of the Agile methodology including planning phase, preparation of product backlogs and iterations. You will play an important role to facilitate communication and problem resolution and deliver maximum value to the customer.

You will be part of a learning culture, where teamwork and collaboration are encouraged, excellence is rewarded, and diversity is respected and valued.


Work Experience

Minimum 5+ years of experience in development and sustaining using-

  • Should have worked Android SDK, Java, Kotlin. Experience on KMM would be a bonus
  • Strong design, development and troubleshooting skills on Android and Multithreaded programming
  • Good understanding of object-oriented design and knowledge of product life cycles and associated issues.
  • Experience with offline storage, threading, and performance tuning
  • Good understanding of Unit Testing &Test-Driven Development

Must Have skills-

The candidate will need to possess skills and experience in

  • Working closely with customers, partners and software teams in designing and developing mobile apps with proven abilities to own and deliver projects
  • Experience in leading and working with Agile and Geo-diversified team
  • Extensive experience on Agile development process/environment on Android/Google TV Apps/projects
  • Good experience in translating mobile designs and wireframes into high quality code- to Design, build, and maintain high performance, reusable, and reliable code
  • Good knowledge of design principles (MVVM) and application/data architecture
  • Awareness of latest technologies and trends
  • Logical thinking and problem-solving skills along with an ability to collaborate
  • Develop technical proof of concept (POC) to validate proposed solution and reduce technical risk
  • Identify and correct bottlenecks and ensure the performance, quality, and responsiveness of the application
  • Good exposure to code-review and test-driven development practices to maintain code quality, organization
  • Exposure to BLE & IoT technology would be an added advantage.
  • Expertise in source control and deployment tools like GIT Lab, Jenkins, etc.
  • Working knowledge of the general mobile landscape, architectures, trends, and emerging technologies is preferred

title: Mobile Engineer

jobDescription:
• Design - Produce functional and technical designs that address business requirements and consider environmental constraints
  • Develop and Deploy - Undertake programming, testing and implementation tasks that meet agreed designs, adhere to required standards and are supportable
  • Subject Matter Expertise - Provide support to business users, utilising business knowledge and technical expertise to achieve desired outcomes
Skills / Knowledge / Abilities / Technology Used:
  • Having overall 2 years of working experience in Cross -Platform mobile application development
  • Required good understanding of Android and iOS platform in terms of development lifecycle.
  • Good understanding of state management like BLoC, Flutter flavors, clean architecture and app architecture
  • Experience using REST application programming interfaces (APIs)
  • Having Hands-on experience in designing and building hybrid/ Cross -Platform mobile app development like flutter, react native.
  • Hands on experience working with and building upon automated application building, testing and publishing pipelines
  • Contributing in all phases of the development lifecycle
  • Expertise in TypeScript or Java is an added advantage
  • Experience in AWS / Azure is an added advantage
  • Experience with the retail industry is an added advantage
  • Must be hands on unit testing and familiar with cross device testing approaches
  • Hands on experience on Android in creating Hybrid / Native applications
  • Ability to lead change, represent end users interests and influence/motivate others effectively

  • Excellent communication skills - persuasive and open communicator
Work Experience:
